title: What will the new music be like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Like the old music but not as good hard question to answer the evolution of music is an ongoing story which is pretty much played out but can always be retweaked and brought up to date with modern technology
ok i think i already said something like pop or the EDM music genre, it i hard to say because the technology is changing so fast it may be something totally different from anything we have today,
